entry.title: Chanakya : Episode 9 - With English Subtitles
entry.content: Chanakya : Episode 9 – With English Subtitles. Credits – Producer : Prakash Dwivedi, Director : Chadraprakash Dwivedi, Cast : Chandraprakash Dwivedi, Dinesh Shakul, Suraj Chaddha, Surendra Pal, Prakash Dwivedi, JD Majethia. Episode Synopsis : Chandragupta is initiated into the world of studies. His uncle is not happy with his decision and asks 5000 gold coins from Vishnugupta. Vishnugupta begins educating his disciplines in all fields including the use of arms. ‘Chanakya’ was a renounced Indian scholar and teacher to the Maurya Emperor Chandragupta. We bring you Dr. Chandraprakash Dwivedi’s popular television series ‘Chanakya’, a 47-part Indian television historical drama that won the prestigious Uptron Awards in the year 1992. The series takes us through the life of Chanakya, his works – Chanakya Neeti and Arthasastra. His teachings on politics, economics and social welfare can be used even today in the modern world. The narration of the story has been kept simple to match up with the finest details that begin from the early life of Vishnugupta (Chanakya) in the kingdom of Magadha to the historic rebellion against Alexander under the leadership of Chandragupta Maurya and ends with the coronation of Chandragupta Maurya as the King of Magadha. The critically acclaimed show is definitely worth watching for its authentic costumes, artistic value and most importantly to strengthen our relationship with the Indian history.

entry.title: Chanakya : Episode 8 - With English Subtitles
entry.content: Chanakya : Episode 8 – With English Subtitles. Credits – Producer : Prakash Dwivedi, Director : Chadraprakash Dwivedi, Cast : Chandraprakash Dwivedi, Dinesh Shakul, Suraj Chaddha, Surendra Pal, Prakash Dwivedi, JD Majethia. Episode Synopsis : Vishnugupta meets the boy Chandragupta and decides to become his teacher. In the grand conference Dhanananda ridicules all the students and graduates, referring to them as beggars. There is a heated converstaion between the two and Vishnugupta leaves the court insulted. ‘Chanakya’ was a renounced Indian scholar and teacher to the Maurya Emperor Chandragupta. entry.title: Chanakya : Episode 6 - With English Subtitles
entry.content: Chanakya : Episode 6 – With English Subtitles. Credits – Producer : Prakash Dwivedi, Director : Chadraprakash Dwivedi, Cast : Chandraprakash Dwivedi, Dinesh Shakul, Suraj Chaddha, Surendra Pal, Prakash Dwivedi, JD Majethia. Episode Synopsis : In a secret meeting Parwateshwar orders his ministers to attack Taxila. Sushen is accused of being a traitor. entry.title: Chanakya : Episode 5 - With English Subtitles
entry.content: Chanakya : Episode 5 – With English Subtitles. Credits – Producer : Prakash Dwivedi, Director : Chadraprakash Dwivedi, Cast : Chandraprakash Dwivedi, Dinesh Shakul, Suraj Chaddha, Surendra Pal, Prakash Dwivedi, JD Majethia. Episode Synopsis : Vishnugupta gains entry into the caravan advancing towards Taxila. He is asked to stay behind and accept the post of a teacher in politics. The king of Kekaya Parwateshwar has spread an elaborate spy system in Taxila. Ambhi orders Sinharan to attack the border of Kekaya. ‘Chanakya’ was a renounced Indian scholar and teacher to the Maurya Emperor Chandragupta.
